I think I may have mis-implemented fitness sharing.

Is fitness sharing done by assigning the offspring
proportional to average fitness of the species or
cumulative fitness of the species.

ie-

f = fitness of an individual
n = individuals in species

species fitness = sum(f)
or 
species fitness = sum(f)/n

Thanks-
Karl
